hydrogen.title: Hydrogen (H)
hydrogen.content: I have discovered a gas which I shall call 'Hydrogen'. It is lighter than air, but an escaped whiff of it made my torch flare alarmingly. I should use caution around open flames.

helium.title: Helium (He)
helium.content: This gas I shall call Helium. It is lighter than air, and almost completely inert.

lithium.title: Lithium (Li)
lithium.content: When I touched this metal with my bare hand, it burned me. Further testing showed that it has a rather violent reaction with water. I shall call it Lithium.

beryllium.title: Beryllium (Be)
beryllium.content: I've discovered a lightweight metal with excellent strength and thermal transfer properties. I'll call it Beryllium.
